TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Mrmurak, title = Mrmurak, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mrmurak} }

S.FORM: Mrmurak Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Mrmurak a niyaro', 43 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 124 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 117 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 92%, Amis 2%, roma 1%.

Mrmorak Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Mrmorak a niyaro', 43 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 124 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 117 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 92%, Amis 2%, roma 1%.
